tool_description: Detects distributed denial of service attacks by analyzing traffic volume, request patterns, and source distributions.

traffic_metrics.description: Traffic volume and connection metrics for DDoS detection.

baseline_traffic.description: Baseline traffic volume in requests per second.

attack_multiplier.description: Traffic multiplier to trigger DDoS alert (2.0-100.0).

source_diversity.description: Whether to analyze source IP diversity for distributed attack detection.

error_messages: Invalid baseline traffic: Baseline traffic must be a positive number.
Invalid attack multiplier: Multiplier must be between 2.0 and 100.0.
Insufficient metrics: Traffic metrics must include volume, timestamp, and source information.
Analysis failed: Unable to calculate traffic patterns from provided metrics.
usage: Provide traffic metrics and baseline traffic volume. Set attack multiplier threshold and enable source diversity analysis. Returns DDoS alerts with attack characteristics.

ddos_alerts.description: DDoS attack alerts with volume, duration, and source analysis

attack_intensity.description: Current traffic intensity compared to baseline

source_analysis.description: Analysis of attack source distribution and characteristics
